text: Anikha Surendran also known mononymously as Baby Anikha is an Indian actress known for her work in the Malayalam film industries. She made her official acting debut in the Malayalam film Kadha Thudarunnu (2010) and gained popularity in other major films, including the Tamil films, Yennai Arindhaal (2015) and Viswasam (2019) both alongside Ajith Kumar. She also acted in the Tamil web series Queen (2019), alongside Gautham Vasudev Menon,Ramya Krishnan, Indrajith, produced by MX player. She received the Kerala State Film Award for Best Child Artist in 2013 for the role of Sethulakshmi in 5 Sundarikal (2013). ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !! Title !! Role !!
